ActivityConstraintBase.Description: To run the SAP activity step, provide a value for the Server field in the Property Sheet.
To run the SAP activity step, provide a value for the System Number field in the Property Sheet.
To run the SAP activity step, provide a value for the Client field in the Property Sheet.
To run the SAP activity step, provide a value for the Username field in the Property Sheet.

GeneralProperties.name: GeneralProperties
GeneralProperties.SectionSchema: <Section name="GeneralProperties" source="true" isSharedMetaData="true" displayName="General properties"><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:types="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0"><xs:import namespace="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0" schemaLocation="..\..\..\dat\schemas\Types.xsd" /><xs:element name="Arguments" types:displayName="Properties"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="StepId" type="xs:string" types:readonly="true" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Step Id" /><xs:element name="Name" default="BAPI_MATERIAL_GET_DETAIL" type="xs:string" types:destination="false" types:displayName="Name" /><xs:element name="FunctionName" types:readonly="true" default="BAPI_MATERIAL_GET_DETAIL" type="xs:string" types:argType="xml" types:configurable="true" types:displayName="Function name" /><xs:element name="Timeout" types:displayName="Timeout" type="xs:int" default="100000"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Time for performing RFC in ms</xs:documentation></xs:annotation></xs:element><xs:element name="ExpectException" type="xs:boolean" types:displayName="Expect Exception" types:configurable="false" /><xs:element name="ConnectionInfo"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Server" type="xs:string" default="10.0.16.14" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Server" /><xs:element name="SystemNumber" type="xs:string" default="00" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="System number" /><xs:element name="Client" type="xs:string" default="800" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Client" /><xs:element name="Username" type="xs:string" default="testuser" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Username" /><xs:element name="Password" type="xs:string" default="UNrrTkMjzFU310JjDiPgdw==" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Password" types:masked="true" /></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element><xs:element name="UseTransaction" types:displayName="Transaction" type="xs:boolean" types:visible="true" types:source="true"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Transaction</xs:documentation></xs:annotation></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema></Section>

InputProperties.name: InputProperties
InputProperties.SectionSchema: <Section name="InputProperties" source="true" dest="true" propertiesType="XML" showXmlControls="true" isSharedMetaData="true" displayName="Import"><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><xs:import schemaLocation="..\..\..\dat\schemas\Types.xsd" namespace="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0" /><xs:element name="Request"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Imports"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element minOccurs="1" name="MATERIAL"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Material No. The string cannot exceed 18 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="18" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element minOccurs="0" name="MATERIAL_EVG"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Valuation type</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="MATERIAL_EXT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>External Long Material Number The string cannot exceed 40 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="40" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MATERIAL_VERS"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Material Version Number The string cannot exceed 10 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="10" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MATERIAL_GUID"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Material number (external GUID) The string cannot exceed 32 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="32" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element><xs:element minOccurs="0" name="PLANT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Plant The string cannot exceed 4 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="4" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element minOccurs="0" name="VALUATIONAREA"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Valuation area The string cannot exceed 4 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="4" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element minOccurs="0" name="VALUATIONTYPE"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Valuation type The string cannot exceed 10 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="10" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema></Section>

OutputProperties.name: OutputProperties
OutputProperties.SectionSchema: <Section name="OutputProperties" source="true" dest="true" checkPoint="true" propertiesType="XML" showXmlControls="true" isSharedMetaData="true" arrayCheckPoint="true" displayName="Export"><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><xs:import schemaLocation="..\..\..\dat\schemas\Types.xsd" namespace="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0" /><xs:element name="Response"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Exports"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element minOccurs="1" name="MATERIALPLANTDATA"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Plant data</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="PUR_GROUP"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Purchasing Group The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="ISSUE_UNIT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Unit of issue The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element><xs:element minOccurs="1" name="MATERIALVALUATIONDATA"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Valuation area data</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="PRICE_CTRL"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Price control indicator The string must be a single character.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="1" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MOVING_PR"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Moving average price/periodic unit price The number of digits to the right of the decimal point cannot exceed 4.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"><xs:totalDigits value="23" /><xs:fractionDigits value="4" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="STD_PRICE"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Standard price The number of digits to the right of the decimal point cannot exceed 4.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"><xs:totalDigits value="23" /><xs:fractionDigits value="4" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="PRICE_UNIT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Price Unit The number of digits to the right of the decimal point cannot exceed 0.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"><xs:totalDigits value="5" /><xs:fractionDigits value="0" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="CURRENCY"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Currency Key The string cannot exceed 5 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="5" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="CURRENCY_ISO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>ISO code currency The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element><xs:element minOccurs="1" name="MATERIAL_GENERAL_DATA"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>General material data</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="MATL_DESC"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Material Description (Short Text) The string cannot exceed 40 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="40" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="OLD_MAT_NO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Old material number The string cannot exceed 18 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="18" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MATL_TYPE"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Material Type The string cannot exceed 4 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="4" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="IND_SECTOR"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Industry sector The string must be a single character.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="1" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="DIVISION"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Division The string cannot exceed 2 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="2" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MATL_GROUP"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Material Group The string cannot exceed 9 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="9" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="PROD_HIER"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Product hierarchy The string cannot exceed 18 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="18" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="BASIC_MATL"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Basic material (basic constituent of a material) - obsolete The string cannot exceed 14 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="14" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="STD_DESCR"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Industry Standard Description (such as ANSI or ISO) The string cannot exceed 18 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="18" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="LAB_DESIGN"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Laboratory/design office The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="PROD_MEMO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Production/inspection memo The string cannot exceed 18 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="18" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="PAGEFORMAT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Page Format of Production Memo The string cannot exceed 4 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="4" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="CONTAINER"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Container requirements The string cannot exceed 2 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="2" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="STOR_CONDS"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Storage conditions The string cannot exceed 2 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="2" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="TEMP_CONDS"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Temperature conditions indicator The string cannot exceed 2 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="2" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="BASE_UOM"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Base Unit of Measure The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="EAN_UPC"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>International Article Number (EAN/UPC) The string cannot exceed 18 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="18" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="EAN_CAT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Category of International Article Number (EAN) The string cannot exceed 2 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="2" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="SIZE_DIM"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Size/dimensions The string cannot exceed 32 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="32" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="GROSS_WT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Gross Weight The number of digits to the right of the decimal point cannot exceed 3.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"><xs:totalDigits value="13" /><xs:fractionDigits value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="NET_WEIGHT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Net Weight The number of digits to the right of the decimal point cannot exceed 3.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"><xs:totalDigits value="13" /><xs:fractionDigits value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="UNIT_OF_WT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Weight Unit The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="VOLUME"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Volume The number of digits to the right of the decimal point cannot exceed 3.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"><xs:totalDigits value="13" /><xs:fractionDigits value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="VOLUMEUNIT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Volume unit The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="LENGTH"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Length The number of digits to the right of the decimal point cannot exceed 3.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"><xs:totalDigits value="13" /><xs:fractionDigits value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="WIDTH"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Width The number of digits to the right of the decimal point cannot exceed 3.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"><xs:totalDigits value="13" /><xs:fractionDigits value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="HEIGHT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Height The number of digits to the right of the decimal point cannot exceed 3.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"><xs:totalDigits value="13" /><xs:fractionDigits value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="UNIT_DIM"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Unit of Dimension for Length/Width/Height The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MANU_MAT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Manufacturer Part Number The string cannot exceed 40 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="40" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MFR_NO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Number of a Manufacturer The string cannot exceed 10 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="10" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="BASE_UOM_ISO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Base unit of measure in ISO code The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="UNIT_OF_WT_ISO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Unit of weight in ISO code The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="VOLUMEUNIT_ISO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Volume unit in ISO code The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="UNIT_DIM_ISO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Unit for length/breadth/height in ISO code The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="CREATED_ON"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Created On</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:date" /></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="CREATED_BY"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Name of Person who Created the Object The string cannot exceed 12 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="12" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="LAST_CHNGE"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Date of Last Change</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:date" /></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="CHANGED_BY"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Name of Person Who Changed Object The string cannot exceed 12 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="12" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MATL_CAT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Material Category The string cannot exceed 2 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="2" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="EMPTIESBOM"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Empties Bill of Material The string must be a single character.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="1" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="BASIC_MATL_NEW"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Basic Material The string cannot exceed 48 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="48" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element><xs:element minOccurs="1" name="RETURN"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Return Parameter</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="TYPE"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message type: S Success, E Error, W Warning, I Info, A Abort The string must be a single character.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="1" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="CODE"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message code The string cannot exceed 5 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="5" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MESSAGE"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message Text The string cannot exceed 220 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="220" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="LOG_NO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Application log: log number The string cannot exceed 20 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="20" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="LOG_MSG_NO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Application log: Internal message serial number The integer cannot exceed 6 digits.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction xmlns:q1="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0" base="q1:numc"><xs:maxLength value="6" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MESSAGE_V1"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message Variable The string cannot exceed 50 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="50" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MESSAGE_V2"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message Variable The string cannot exceed 50 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="50" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MESSAGE_V3"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message Variable The string cannot exceed 50 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="50" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MESSAGE_V4"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Message Variable The string cannot exceed 50 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="50" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema></Section>
